mapper.insert: insert into buy(po_no, o_odno, po_total, pa_no, cpa_no, d_dno, po_drequest,po_price, po_ptype, po_name, po_number,po_addr,po_status) values((select nvl(max(po_no),0)+1 from buy), #{o_odno}, #{po_total}, #{pa_no}, #{cpa_no}, #{d_dno}, #{po_drequest}, #{po_price}, #{po_ptype}, #{po_name}, #{po_number}, #{po_addr}, #{po_status})
mapper.select: select * from buy order by po_no asc
mapper.update: update buy set po_name = #{po_name}, um_no = #{um_no} where po_no = #{po_no}
mapper.select: select * from buy left join couponap on buy.cpa_no = couponap.cpa_no left join pointap on buy.pa_no = pointap.pa_no left join delivery on buy.d_dno = delivery.d_dno left join productbuy on buy.o_odno = productbuy.o_odno left join product on buy.p_pno = product.p_pno
